name: Endless Fruit Collector
description:
This is a game that I developed for The Game Circle Game Jam

The idea is to collect the right fruits when the game keeps getting much faster. You have three health and when you collect wrong fruit, you'll lose one health. When you collect food, the game will slow a bit(currentMoveSpeed - (currentMoveSpeed / 40) ). So if you collect the right fruits nonstop, the game will last longer.

Sounds: freesound.org

Fruit assets: kenney.nl

Developed Solo by Berk Kalelioğlu
